segments.text: All right . Over here , sir . How are you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you want you hair cut ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't make it too short . I just want a trim .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . I will use the scissors.Do you always part your hair on the left ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do.That looks good . It's not too short.It ' s just right . How much do I owe you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is 4 dollars , keep the change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . Come back to see us .
segments.speaker: S1
